'''Electro Sigils''' can be found in [[Inazuma]]. It can be offered to the [[Sacred Sakura]] to increase the [[Sacred Sakura's Favor]] Level to obtain valuable rewards, and increase [[Electrogranum]]'s level. Reaching maximum rank of Sacred Sakura's favor unlocks [[Netsuke no Gen Crafts]]' Sigil shop.

They can be obtained in Inazuma by opening [[Chests]], completing [[One-Time Domain]]s, and from rewards from the [[Statue of The Seven]].
